Text: I saw the movie "Oblivion" last night. Very Hollywood, with some good special effects and visuals. The plot was OK - some parts reminding me of "The Matrix" and "Avatar". But I really liked the soundtrack and when I watched the credits, I was pleasantly surprised to see that it was by M83, a great group. So now I like forward to hearing the soundtrack by itself. Thanks for the upload!

thanks! good upload and good movie, it was very (guessable)? ( is that even a word? ) but anyway loved it and loved the soundtrack even more good job Anthony, this should win best soundtrack without a doubt.
real deal Thank You. Music are great.
Thanks @Vitamin_X ... This soundtrack is amazing... M83 FTW now.
This movie was epicly awesome.  Thanks for the upload, damned music store didn't have it yet.

I love the movie and the awesome score ,it remind me the tunes from Tron Legacy by Daft Punk maybe Kosinski is adicted to the style ,Amazing work by Z M83. Thank you so much for sharing this with us .
